speaker: Owner's Office
lines: Ledgers fill the wall from desk to door.
A small crown sits in a drawer.
A city map is marked with stains and rings.
A stein sweats on a shelf though it is empty.
The owner is gone; the chair is still warm.
A trapdoor rests beneath the desk.
Three coins lie on the blotter: real, wood, and strange.
A hook on the door holds a 'Closed' sign.

choices.text: Pocket the wood coin and leave.

give_item.name: Wood Coin
give_item.description: Buys luck in places that need it

choices.text: Open the trapdoor and trust your ankles.
